languages.text: "Коллектив Амарнат был сотворен как философ и исследователь. Производимые им концепции были столь могущественны, что чуть не уничтожили флот Осознание. Но затем он столкнулся с дилеммой, не поддающейся решению. И тогда Амарнат разъединился".

"The Amarnat Collective was designed to be a philosopher and a researcher. The concepts he produced were so powerful that they almost destroyed the Cognisance Fleet. But then he faced an unsolvable dilemma. And that was when Amarnat came apart."
languages.original_text: "Коллектив Амарнат был сотворен как философ и исследователь. Производимые им концепции были столь могущественны, что чуть не уничтожили флот Осознание. Но затем он столкнулся с дилеммой, не поддающейся решению. И тогда Амарнат разъединился".

traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: 「アマルナト集合体は哲学者にして研究者になるよう設計された。非情に強力な考えを持つように作られたため、コグニサンス艦隊を壊滅しかけた。だが、解決できないジレンマに直面した。それが、アマルナトが崩壊したときのことだ」
languages.original_text: "The Amarnat Collective was designed to be a philosopher and a researcher. The concepts he produced were so powerful that they almost destroyed the Cognisance Fleet. But then he faced an unsolvable dilemma. And that was when Amarnat came apart."

traits.locale_text: 「アマルナト集合体は哲学者にして研究者になるよう設計された。非情に強力な考えを持つように作られたため、コグニサンス艦隊を壊滅しかけた。だが、解決できないジレンマに直面した。それが、アマルナトが崩壊したときのことだ」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “阿玛纳特聚合意识在设计之初，是以哲学家与研究者的身份出现的。他创造的那些概念非常强大，几乎摧垮了真理开拓者舰队。但随后，他面临着某个无法解决的困境，而就在那时，阿玛纳特聚合意识分裂了。”
languages.original_text: "The Amarnat Collective was designed to be a philosopher and a researcher. The concepts he produced were so powerful that they almost destroyed the Cognisance Fleet. But then he faced an unsolvable dilemma. And that was when Amarnat came apart."

traits.locale_text: “阿玛纳特聚合意识在设计之初，是以哲学家与研究者的身份出现的。他创造的那些概念非常强大，几乎摧垮了真理开拓者舰队。但随后，他面临着某个无法解决的困境，而就在那时，阿玛纳特聚合意识分裂了。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Le collectif Amarnat a été conçu pour être aussi bien un philosophe qu'un chercheur. Il a produit des concepts d'une puissance telle qu'ils ont presque détruit la Flotte de la Connaissance. Mais il a dû faire face à un dilemme insoluble. C'est à ce moment-là qu'Amarnat s'est désintégré. »
languages.original_text: "The Amarnat Collective was designed to be a philosopher and a researcher. The concepts he produced were so powerful that they almost destroyed the Cognisance Fleet. But then he faced an unsolvable dilemma. And that was when Amarnat came apart."

traits.locale_text: « Le collectif Amarnat a été conçu pour être aussi bien un philosophe qu'un chercheur. Il a produit des concepts d'une puissance telle qu'ils ont presque détruit la Flotte de la Connaissance. Mais il a dû faire face à un dilemme insoluble. C'est à ce moment-là qu'Amarnat s'est désintégré. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «El Colectivo Amarnat se creó para ser un filósofo y un investigador. Los conceptos que ideó eran tan poderosos que casi destruyen a la Flota Conciencia, pero se encontró con un dilema irresoluble. Esa fue la razón de la caída de Amarnat».
languages.original_text: "The Amarnat Collective was designed to be a philosopher and a researcher. The concepts he produced were so powerful that they almost destroyed the Cognisance Fleet. But then he faced an unsolvable dilemma. And that was when Amarnat came apart."

traits.locale_text: «El Colectivo Amarnat se creó para ser un filósofo y un investigador. Los conceptos que ideó eran tan poderosos que casi destruyen a la Flota Conciencia, pero se encontró con un dilema irresoluble. Esa fue la razón de la caída de Amarnat».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Das Amarnat-Kollektiv wurde als Philosoph und Forscher erschaffen. Die Konzepte, die er hervorbrachte, waren so mächtig, dass sie die Erkenntnisflotte fast zerstört hätten. Doch dann stand er vor einem unlösbaren Dilemma. Und da zerfiel Amarnat."
languages.original_text: "The Amarnat Collective was designed to be a philosopher and a researcher. The concepts he produced were so powerful that they almost destroyed the Cognisance Fleet. But then he faced an unsolvable dilemma. And that was when Amarnat came apart."

traits.locale_text: "Das Amarnat-Kollektiv wurde als Philosoph und Forscher erschaffen. Die Konzepte, die er hervorbrachte, waren so mächtig, dass sie die Erkenntnisflotte fast zerstört hätten. Doch dann stand er vor einem unlösbaren Dilemma. Und da zerfiel Amarnat."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Amarnat Bütünlüğü, bir filozof ve araştırmacı olacak şekilde tasarlandı. Ortaya koyduğu anlayışlar ve görüşler öylesine güçlüydü ki neredeyse Malumat Filosu'nu yok edecekti. Ancak sonrasında Amarnat, çözülemez bir ikilemle karşı karşıya kaldı. Bu nedenle de parçalandı."
languages.original_text: "The Amarnat Collective was designed to be a philosopher and a researcher. The concepts he produced were so powerful that they almost destroyed the Cognisance Fleet. But then he faced an unsolvable dilemma. And that was when Amarnat came apart."

traits.locale_text: "Amarnat Bütünlüğü, bir filozof ve bir araştırmacı olacak şekilde tasarlandı. Ürettiği konseptler öylesine güçlüydü ki neredeyse Malumat Filosu'nu yok edecekti. Ancak sonrasında Amarnat çözülemez bir ikilemle karşı karşıya kaldı ve bu nedenle de parçalandı."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
